title: Lead Designer
tagsAndSkills: Printing,Data analysis,Graphic designing,Illustrator,adobe creative suite,Corel Draw,Desktop publishing,Photoshop
jobDescription:
Roles Responsibilities:

  • Visualizer cum designer to support the overall creative requirements of brand and business communications
  • The position will lead the design vertical at PropertyPistol and will guide mentor the existing team of 2 designers
  • The candidate should have proven visualization and graphic designing experience of 10 years
  • Strong ability to conceptualize campaign positioning and creative designs
  • Design end-to-end advertising campaigns in close coordination with the content and design team
  • Should have managed varied real estate campaigns supporting launch collateral across mediums - print, outdoors, branding signages, etc
  • A strong eye for visual composition, typography color for print media (reports, infographics, brochures, flyers)
  • Possession of creative flair, versatility, conceptual ability, +and originality
  • Facilitate brand guidelines extension of PRPL in close consultation with the Marketing team

Skills Requirement:

  • Proficiency in desktop publishing tools: Corel Draw and/or Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, InDesign, and Illustrator).
  • Good communication skills - English, Hindi Marathi
  • Effective time management skills and the ability to meet tight deadlines
  • Experience in liaising with printers, knowledge about printing production and techniques
  • A bachelor s degree in graphic design, design, or art from a reputed institute will be preferred
  • Exposure to the real estate industry is a must. The ideal candidate would be a senior design lead at an agency or working for a real estate brand.
  • A team player
  • A strong portfolio (in PDF format) is a must.

title: Visualizer 3D
jobDescription:
Advantus Business Solutions Private Limited is looking for 3D Visualizer to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey
  • A 3D Visualizer is a creative professional who creates and produces 3D images, animations, and visual presentations to communicate ideas and designs to clients, stakeholders, and the public
  • They play a critical role in the design and architecture industries, helping to bring ideas to life and make them more understandable to a wider audience
Responsibilities:
  • Use 3D modeling software, such as 3D Studio Max, SketchUp, or Blender, to create high-quality 3D images, animations, and visual presentations
  • Incorporate client feedback into 3D models to ensure that they meet project requirements and objectivesStay up-to-date with the latest developments in 3D visualization technology and practices
  • Manage multiple projects and meet deadlines in a fast-paced environment
